name: Cactus Ray - LD 35 Compo Entry
description:
WEB VERSION: https://neontropics.itch.io/ld35-cactus-ray-web

Made for Ludum Dare 35 - Compo

My first Ludum Dare!

After the first day I switched from an action game to more of a puzzle game + redid all the graphics, so it's all very last minute. It still shows the concept succesfully I think and has some solid basic mechanics.

Change shape with X, also warp between any of the 5 levels by pressing their respective number on the keyboard.
